file.name: exchange.yaml
file.content:
components:
  schemas:
    tmp0:
      properties:
        failed: {type: string}
        not_found: {type: string}
        recipients_affected: {type: string}
        success: {type: string}
        wont_process: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp1:
      properties:
        attach_info: {type: string}
        attachments: {type: string}
        attachments_md5: {type: string}
        attachments_sha1: {type: string}
        attachments_sha256: {type: string}
        cc: {type: string}
        date: {type: string}
        error: {type: string}
        exchange_message_id: {type: string}
        headers: {type: string}
        html_body: {type: string}
        id: {type: string}
        raw_content: {type: string}
        raw_headers: {type: string}
        recipients: {type: string}
        reply_to: {type: string}
        result: {type: string}
        rtf_body: {type: string}
        sender: {type: string}
        subject: {type: string}
        text_body: {type: string}
        type: {type: string}
        valid_recipients_email: {type: string}
        valid_reply_to_email: {type: string}
        valid_sender_email: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp2:
      properties:
        date_moved: {type: string}
        new_email_id: {type: string}
        success: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp3:
      properties:
        sent_response: {type: string}
        time_sent: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp4:
      properties:
        date_added: {type: string}
        success: {type: string}
      type: object
  securitySchemes: {}
info:
  contact: {email: frikky@shuffler.io, name: '@frikkylikeme', url: 'https://twitter.com/frikkylikeme'}
  description: Automated generation of Microsoft Exchange
  title: Microsoft Exchange
  version: 1.0.0
  x-logo: data:image/png;base64,
openapi: 3.0.2
paths:
  tmp0:
    post:
      description: Delete emails from all inboxes that match a given query
      parameters:
      - description: Delete Type, one of 'trash', 'soft', or 'hard'
        example: trash
        in: query
        name: Delete Type
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Run the delete task without actually deleting to see what would
          happen
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Dry Run
        required: true
        schema: {type: boolean}
      - description: Max limit of messages to match from the query, set to -1 to be
          unlimited
        example: ''
        in: body
        name: Delete Limit
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Ignore exceptions when deleting if set to True, defaults to False
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Ignore Exceptions
        required: true
        schema: {type: boolean}
      - description: Query string to filter emails in the inbox for. Comma separated.
        example: subject=asdf,is_read=False
        in: query
        name: Search Query String
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: String delimiter to split input data on the query string. Defaults
          to ','
        example: ','
        in: query
        name: Pair Delimiter
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Assignment delimiter to split the query string. Defaults to '='
        example: '='
        in: query
        name: Value Delimiter
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: To increase performance on large Exchange instances, increase
          this number by multiples of 2. Capped at 32
        example: '4'
        in: body
        name: Thread Worker Count
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp0'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Exchange Delete From All Mailboxes
  tmp1:
    post:
      description: Gets metadata about unread emails on a Microsoft Exchange email
        account
      parameters:
      - description: Filter mail by subjects containing value, case insensitive.
        example: invoice
        in: query
        name: Subject Filter
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Filter mail by sender.
        example: mike@school.edu
        in: query
        name: Sender
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Retrieves all messages (could take a long time) if False, only
          unread messages if True (Default).
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Return Unread Only
        required: false
        schema: {type: boolean}
      - description: If True saves emails as read (default), if false saves emails
          as unread.
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Save Mail as Read/Unread
        required: false
        schema: {type: boolean}
      - description: Allows a user to limit the number of results to be returned.
          Defaults to all, returns most recent first.
        example: ''
        in: body
        name: Number of Emails to Return
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: CSV list of extensions that will be ignored, defaults to .png,.jpg,.jpeg,.gif
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Exclude extensions
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Ignore exceptions parsing an email. Defaults to False
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Ignore Exceptions
        required: false
        schema: {type: boolean}
      - description: Optional folder name to grab emails from. If left blank will
          grab emails from inbox. See README for details on subfolders
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Folder Name
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Query string to filter emails in the inbox for. Comma separated.
        example: subject=asdf,is_read=False
        in: query
        name: Search Query String
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: String delimiter to split input data on the query string.
        example: ','
        in: query
        name: Pair Delimiter
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Assignment delimiter to split the query string.
        example: '='
        in: query
        name: Value Delimiter
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Use Impersonation rights to retrieve mail. If False will use
          Delegate permissions
        example: 'True'
        in: query
        name: Use Impersonate
        required: false
        schema: {type: boolean}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp1'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Exchange Get Email Metadata
  tmp2:
    post:
      description: Move an Email to another Folder in Exchange.
      parameters:
      - description: Message ID of the email to modify
        example: AAMkADMxZmU3ZWQ4LTMzNGItNGY3ZC1iM2UxLWM3MDQzOGVjMzlkNwBGAAAAAAAGYPwuVwMWSrFeyLv6XHMzBwCBJRT7/oiDTLpLg45RvPkCAAAAAAEMAACBJRT9/oiDTLpLg45RvPkCAAAf+jMxAAA=
        in: query
        name: Exchange Message ID
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Folder to Move to
        example: MyFolder
        in: query
        name: Folder
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Use Impersonation rights to retrieve mail. If False will use
          Delegate permissions
        example: 'True'
        in: query
        name: Use Impersonate
        required: false
        schema: {type: boolean}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp2'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Exchange Move Email to Folder
  tmp3:
    post:
      description: Reply to an email in Exchange with a template
      parameters:
      - description: Message ID of the email to reply to
        example: AAMkADMxZmU3ZWQ4LTMzNGItNGY3ZC1iM2UxLWM3MDQzOGVjMzlkNwBGAAAAAAAGYPwuVwMWSrFeyLv6XHMzBwCBJRT7/oiDTLpLg45RvPkCAAAAAAEMAACBJRT9/oiDTLpLg45RvPkCAAAf+jMxAAA=
        in: query
        name: Exchange Message ID
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Body of the reply email
        example: Do not respond to this email.
        in: query
        name: Template for Body of Email
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Include the Sender's Name at the top of the message
        example: 'True'
        in: query
        name: Include Senders Name in Body
        required: false
        schema: {type: boolean}
      - description: Use Impersonation rights to retrieve mail. If False will use
          Delegate permissions
        example: 'True'
        in: query
        name: Use Impersonate
        required: false
        schema: {type: boolean}
      - description: Use HTML for the body, defaults to true
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Use HTML
        required: false
        schema: {type: boolean}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp3'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Exchange Reply to Email with Template
  tmp4:
    post:
      description: Add a category to an email in Exchange.
      parameters:
      - description: Message ID of the email to modify
        example: AAMkADMxZmU3ZWQ4LTMzNGItNGY3ZC1iM2UxLWM3MDQzOGVjMzlkNwBGAAAAAAAGYPwuVwMWSrFeyLv6XHMzBwCBJRT7/oiDTLpLg45RvPkCAAAAAAEMAACBJRT9/oiDTLpLg45RvPkCAAAf+jMxAAA=
        in: query
        name: Exchange Message ID
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Categories to apply to the Email
        example: '[MyCategory]'
        in: query
        name: Category List
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Set the Email's category to only the given inputs, removing any
          other categories
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Override Previous Categories
        required: false
        schema: {type: boolean}
      - description: Ignore the input category, and clear all categories on this email
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Clear All Categories
        required: false
        schema: {type: boolean}
      - description: Use Impersonation rights to retrieve mail. If False will use
          Delegate permissions
        example: 'True'
        in: query
        name: Use Impersonate
        required: false
        schema: {type: boolean}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp4'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Exchange Set Email Category
tags:
- {name: Communication}

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: at 1:4024: path MUST begin with a forward slash
